Package xml.spreadsheet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Style
    This class contains the information for a style definition in an XML spreadsheet.
    XMLSpreadsheetGenerator
    Partial implementation of the spreadsheet format described in the article
    Microsoft XML Spreadsheet Reference
    The generator will follow this state machine:
    Constructor -> [Create style]* -> startDocument -> [openSheet -> [column]* -> [openRow -> [writeCell]* -> closeRow]* -> closeSheet ]* -> closeDocument
    The Generator will throw a XMLSpreadsheetException if the API user tries to break the state machine (say for example, try to write a cell after closing the document, or writing a row before opening a sheet)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Charset
    Recognized character sets:
    00H = 0 = ANSI Latin
    A2H = 162 = ANSI Turkish
    01H = 1 = System default
    A3H = 163 = ANSI Vietnamese
    02H = 2 = Symbol
    B1H = 177 = ANSI Hebrew
    4DH = 77 = Apple Roman
    B2H = 178 = ANSI Arabic
    80H = 128 = ANSI Japanese Shift-JIS
    BAH = 186 = ANSI Baltic
    81H = 129 = ANSI Korean (Hangul)
    CCH = 204 = ANSI Cyrillic
    82H = 130 = ANSI Korean (Johab)
    DEH = 222 = ANSI Thai
    86H = 134 = ANSI Chinese Simplified GBK
    EEH = 238 = ANSI Latin II (Central European)
    88H = 136 = ANSI Chinese Traditional BIG5
    FFH = 255 = OEM Latin I
    A1H = 161 = ANSI Greek
    Source: Open Office file format documentation
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    XMLSpreadsheetException
    Checked exception type for XML Spreadsheet generation
